greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ordered set partitions of {1, ..., n} with no singletons or cyclical adjacencies (successive elements in the same block, where 1 is a successor of n).
link: David Callan, On conjugates for set partitions and integer compositions, arXiv:math/0508052 [math.CO], 2005.
example: The a(4) = 2 ordered set partitions are: {{1,3},{2,4}}, {{2,4},{1,3}}.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Feb 14 2019
